items.name: Ext_Org_Type_Show
items.label: انواع سازمانهاي خارجي ثبت شده
items.sql:
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(concat(ORG_Master_Code," || ",ORG_Name),'\n' )
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
and IsActive = 1

options.label: كد 501 تا 700 ||  كار گروه‌ها و كميته‌ها

items.name: EX_Counter
items.label: شمارنده سازمان خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT count(ID)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
 and IsDelete + IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_Type_Select
items.label: ايجاد واحد سازماني ذيل ...
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ORG_Master_Code, 'سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_Master_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_Master_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type' 
 and ORG_L1_Code = 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'

items.name: Org_Type_Show
items.label: واحدهاي موجود در سازمان
items.sql:
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name),'\n' )  
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and IsActive = 1

FROM PMT_TB100009

 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
